Qwotable.changelog:
Changelog:

This release may bring following fixes:

- Support of the Onboarding screen for smaller devices (yet to be tested)

New Features in this release:

- Adding language support for French and German
- Adding possibility of changing the app color (more colors are yet to be implemented)
- Updater for full releases + beta releases (yet to be tested)
- Switch for beta release
- Card on home fragment shows update or beta update
> Important: If there is a full release, it only shows the full release as beta versions should be at least one version code higher than full releases

Changes in this release:

- Replacing the Frame layout with a so called ViewPager
- Quotes now show two credit texts. The first shows the author and the second the media where it can be found
- The example card's layout now follow the layout of the card of the quotes and wisdom


THIS IS A BETA RELEASE AND MAY NOT BE STABLE YET. IT IS FOR TESTING PURPOSES ONLY
Qwotable.changelogBeta: This is the last release with the updater. Please make sure, that if you install this app from github, updates via FDroid won't work.

Home Harmony.changelogBeta: First beta version of Home Harmony
